```{r imports}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r MCC}
data = read.csv("mcc-data.csv")
ggplot(data, aes(x=100*Iteration, y=Success.Mean, colour=factor(Nu))) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_y_continuous() +
  labs(title="MCC with Focus Tracker (r=0.15)",
       x="Iterations", y="Average Success (Testing Set)", colour="Nu")
```

```{r GP}
data = read.csv("gp-data.csv")
str(data)

ggplot(data, aes(x=100*Iteration, y=Success.Mean, colour=factor(Kernel))) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_y_continuous() +
  labs(title="GP with Focus Tracker (r=0.15)",
       x="Iterations", y="Average Success (Testing Set)", colour="Kernel")
```
